oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Jamison Bedding - 1956-06-30 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Jamison Bedding sponsored Grand Ole Opry show from June 30, 1956. Hosted by Hank Snow with announcer Dave Overton. Part 2: http://cmfdigitization.cmf.int:2011/cdm/ref/collection/musicaudio/id/525
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Old Hickory Singers; Hank Snow; Red Sovine; Bun Wilson; Fruit Jar Drinkers; Ralph Sloan; Tennessee Travelers; Benny Martin
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Jamison Bedding theme (Old Hickory Singers) -- Opening statement (Dave Overton) -- Caribbean (Hank Snow) -- Hank Snow introduces Red Sovine -- Red Sovine introduces Bun Wilson -- Why Baby Why (Red Sovine, Bun Wilson) -- Dave Overton and Hank Snow introduce the Old Hickory Singers -- Jamison Bedding jingle (Old Hickory Singers) -- Jamison Bedding commercial (Dave Overton, Hank Snow) -- Hank Snow introduces the Fruit Jar Drinkers and Ralph Sloan and the Tennessee Travelers -- Ida Red (Fruit Jar Drinkers) -- Hank Snow introduces Benny Martin -- Whip-poor-will (Benny Martin) -- Jamison Bedding commercial (Dave Overton) -- Hank Snow introduces Maybelle Carter and the Carter Sisters [continued in part 2]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); National Life & Accident Insurance Company, Inc. (Nashville, Tenn.); Overton, Dave; Snow, Hank; Old Hickory Singers; Sovine, Red; Wilson, Bun; Sharpe, Claude, 1902-1969; Hughes, Marvin; Sloan, Ralph; Tennessee Travelers; Fruit Jar Drinkers (Musical group); Martin, Benny
